discussiontools-error-comment-conflict: Wa dwenkyerɛ no ntumi sea, firi sɛ obi foforɔ akyerɛ na dwene saa bia naa mu. Nti sane bue bia no foforɔ anaa hwɛ adwenkerɛ foforɔ no.
discussiontools-replywidget-terms-click: Sɛ wo mia "$1" so a, wagye mmra a ɛfa wiki wei so nyinaa atumu
discussiontools-replywidget-transcluded: Yɛ bɛ kora wo mmuae no wɔ
discussiontools-topicsubscription-button: Di akyi na wo nsa aka mmuae foforɔ ho nkaebo
Nni akyi na si nkaebɔ ano
discussiontools-topicsubscription-action: Wo nni nyinasosɛm yi akyi anaa?
discussiontools-topicsubscription-error-: Y3 anhunu neɛ wo di akyiri no
discussiontools-topicsubscription-notify: W'nsa nka nsusuiɛ foforɔ ho nkaebɔ wɔ nnyinasosɛm yi ho
W'nsa nka nsusuiɛ foforɔ ho nkaebɔ wɔ nnyinasosɛm yi ho
tag-discussiontools-description: Wɔ de nkɔmmɔdie akade na yɛɛ nsakyerae
tag-discussiontools-added-comment-descri: Nkɔmmɔdi bea mmuae abɛka saa nsesae yi mu
tag-discussiontools-edit-description: Dwumadifoɔ de nkɔmmɔdie akade sesaa mmuae a ɛwɔ hɔ dada
tag-discussiontools-newtopic-description: Dwumadifoɔ yi nnam nkɔmmɔdie akade de nyinasos3m foforɔ kaa ɔfa yi ho
tag-discussiontools-reply-description: Dwumadifoɔ no de nkɔmmɔdie akade yii asɛmbisa bi ano
tag-discussiontools-source-description: Na nkɔmmɔdie akade wɔ bea a ne ti firi
tag-discussiontools-source-enhanced-desc: Na nkɔmmɔdie akade wɔ bea ɛfiri no akade akorade
tag-discussiontools-visual-description: Akadeɛ a wo betumi de adi nkɔmmɔ no yɛ neɛ wo de w'ani hunu
